acquire.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to obtain something by buying it or being given it
acquire.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
The council acquired the land using a compulsory purchase order.
acquire.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The college acquired a reputation for very high standards.

acquire.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to gain knowledge or learn a skill
acquire.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: He spent years acquiring his skills as a surgeon.
Elsie acquired a good knowledge of Chinese.
acquire.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The group wants to acquire the company for $18 a share.
